member.name: T:Litium.Extensions.Favourite.License
member.summary: A class used for determing if there is a valid license dll for Favourite in the /Bin/ folder

member.name: M:Litium.Extensions.Favourite.License.CheckLicense(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the license for Favourite is valid
member.returns: True if there is a valid license, otherwise false
